end_sources()
#END-FILE-LIST

macro(setup_CryPhysics)
	target_link_libraries(${THIS_PROJECT} PRIVATE qpOASES)
	if (ORBIS OR CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "Clang")
		target_compile_options(${THIS_PROJECT} PRIVATE
			-Wno-shift-negative-value
			-Wno-writable-strings
			-Wno-c++11-narrowing
			-Wno-parentheses
			-Wno-reorder
			-Wno-unused-value
			-Wno-unknown-pragmas
			-Wno-format
			-Wno-unused-private-field
			-Wno-multichar
			-Wno-switch
			-Wno-unused-function
			-Wno-char-subscripts
			-Wno-constant-conversion
			-Wno-null-dereference
			-Wno-array-bounds
			-Wno-shift-negative-value
			-Wno-undefined-var-template
			-Wno-empty-body
			-Wno-stringop-overflow
			-Wno-overloaded-virtual
		)
    elseif(CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "GNU")
		target_compile_options(${THIS_PROJECT} PRIVATE
			-Wno-unused-function
			-Wno-unused-value
			-Wno-sign-compare
			-Wno-ignored-attributes
			-Wno-invalid-offsetof
			-Wno-aligned-new
			-Wno-int-in-bool-context
			-Wno-unused-but-set-variable
			-Wno-misleading-indentation
			-Wno-unknown-pragmas
			-Wno-narrowing
			-Wno-strict-aliasing
			-Wno-strict-overflow
			-Wno-maybe-uninitialized
			-Wno-array-bounds
			-Wno-multichar
			-Wno-char-subscripts
			-Wno-conversion-null
			-Wno-parentheses
			-Wno-comment
			-Wno-reorder
			-Wno-address
			-Wno-format
			-Wno-switch
			-Wno-stringop-overflow
		)
    endif()
endmacro()

if(NOT RESOURCE_COMPILER)
	if (PHYSICS_CRYPHYSICS)
		CryEngineModule(CryPhysics PCH "StdAfx.cpp" SOLUTION_FOLDER "CryEngine")
		setup_CryPhysics()
	else()
		CryFileContainer(CryPhysics SOLUTION_FOLDER "CryEngine")
	endif()
	if (OPTION_PHYSDBGR)
		CryEngineStaticModule(CryPhysicsLib PCH "StdAfx.cpp" SOLUTION_FOLDER "PhysDebugger")
		setup_CryPhysics()
		target_include_directories(${THIS_PROJECT} BEFORE PRIVATE ../../Tools/PhysDebugger)
		target_compile_options(${THIS_PROJECT} PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Profile>:/GL /O2 /Ot> $<$<CONFIG:Release>:/GL /O2 /Ot> $<$<CONFIG:Debug>:/RTCu> )
	endif()
else()
	CryResourceCompilerModule(CryPhysicsRC PCH "StdAfx.cpp" SOLUTION_FOLDER "RC")
	setup_CryPhysics()
endif()
